info.title: Slack Real Time Messaging API
info.description: The API for management Slack Real Time Messagings

get.summary: Starts a Real Time Messaging session.
get.description: Starts a Real Time Messaging session.

parameters.name: mpim_aware
parameters.description: Returns MPIMs to the client in the API response.

parameters.name: no_unreads
parameters.description: Skip unread counts for each channel (improves performance).

parameters.name: simple_latest
parameters.description: Return timestamp only for latest message object of each channel (improves performance).
